更新自选交易对

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"UserCollectionDTO","required":["symbols"],"type":"object","properties":{"symbols":{"type":"array","description":"全量更新自选交易对,每次操作必须传数组，全部删除了就是也需要传空数组","items":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
